Name: Integer truncation error

Characteristic.Characteristic1: Casts a long integer to a short integer

Characteristic.Characteristic2: The short integer is not accurate enough to accurately save the value of the long integer, so there is a loss of precision after truncation.

Consequence: In general, this bug causes a loss of accuracy. When the result of the loss of accuracy is used to calculate the amount of ethers, it causes economic loss,
